body: No, just whenever I remember. Lee’s stuff is really under appreciated.
@Titty_Armory do you come back here every 5 months or something.
@green_land_ball, this is starting to feel like an early scenario in the anime, "Plastic Memories."

Biribiri, it's sad now that you said it, I guess technology has its limits and also she wouldn't age like a normal person, idk, may be the batteries can be recharged or replaced again, I think it's fine as long as you take care of the Hugging Pillows body, cleaning and maintaining it, maybe paying for the batteries would cost a lot though, probably more than buying a new one cause they think once the person becomes to attach to them, they would want them to live longer and stick with them longer so it would make sense that batteries would probably be more expensive than buying new ones
If no one gets what I meant 5 m o n t h s a g o , I was implying she only lasts for a year.
